verses.verse: O praise <S%H1984><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, all ye nations <S%H1471><s%>; Laud <S%H7623><s%> him <S%H1471><s%>, all ye peoples.

For his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1396><s%> toward us <S%H571><s%>; And the truth of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> endureth for ever <S%H5769><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
